channel.title: Runescape Classic Idea
channel.description:
I have a Rs2 Server put up on the board (I think) I forget really since I never go on it anymore, but I'm still running it.
More importantly, Allow us Runescape Classic people to put our servers up on the Status Page? I want to get some Rs2 Kids on here.

item.title: Runescape Classic Idea
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’m talking about implementing RSC servers into the current page.

Also that’s why I said OR, if you have a custom client, you can run it inside of MoparScape 4 with all of your modifications. Soon all servers on the serverstatus page will be required to do that. Before it’s a requirement though, I will post easy to follow simple instructions on how to make it all work.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape Classic Idea
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:2, topic:407648”]Soon you will be able to.

As long as your client runs inside MoparScape 4, or you can use the built-in classic client that will be done soon.[/quote]

Can’t we have a Runescape Cassic Status page though? Or Implement it into your current one, most Runescape Classic servers are different and aren’t directed to do a remake of the original Runescape Classic. (Like yours will be).

For example, my client has different features. A Zoom in, a Zoom out, A ScreenShot Capture, A K\D Ratio on the side to toggle it on and off with F6 and my client is re done to go past the max animations of the original runescape classic client since I have about 100+ new items (For skills). So it wouldn’t work in the Moparscape 4 client you guys are making.

We just don’t get much Advertisement since we post a topic in the Runescape Classic forum and only people who know about Runescape Classic usually go there, or kids who post 317 Topics there. A lot of people in the Runescape 2 Scene might want to try it out, or may not even know it exist or have looked at it.

Edit: Also the Runescape Classic players are lowering more and more each day, so it would be nice if we could get some of the Rs2 people to try it out.

Read full topic
